titleStmt.title: A briefe and necessarie catechisme, concerning the principall poynts of our Christian religion Written for the good of all such as seeke after consolation in Christ. By R.C.
titleStmt.author: R. C., fl. 1602.
Greenham, Richard, attributed name. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for Edward VVhite, and are to be solde at the little North doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: This is a version of Richard Greenham's catechism in STC 12312, and the author's initials on title page may be a misprint for R.G.--STC.
Running title reads: A briefe and necessary catechisme.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the little North doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun
